Posted: August 28, 2015
												The game is quite good for 5  bucks.  If pinball and mini golf had a kid this would be it. You can also pull off some pretty nice trick shots if you upgrade your ball with the steering plugin.

Posted: August 17, 2016
												This game was a lot of fun with an epic story line. I personally think that the level design was great along with the characters between Orbit, T.O.R.K., and Tess. After my second playthrough it is still fun!
